duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure adherence to the appropriate IT governance functions and facilitate the establishment of project portfolio definition and processes.
Collaborate with senior business and IT leaders to identify opportunities, facilitate RFP and selection processes for technology solutions.
Lead and manage the execution of projects, including annual planning, demand management, and strategic alignment based on portfolio categories and criteria.
Provide oversight of project managers, including coaching and mentoring, to ensure successful project delivery.
Direct the development and maintenance of communications and reporting about project portfolios and their contents.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in technical field or related field of study required. Master’s Degree preferred.
Minimum of five (5) years’ experience in Information Technology, including project management and leadership roles.
